name: Create a new Epic with name and the comments with numeric value

steps.name: Given I set up a "POST" request to "/projects/{proj_id}/epics" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I should see a message: "The 'text' parameter value was '123' but must be of type 'extended_string'

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Testing Negative for Epic and Epics for Post and Put
